content.en: Tourism forecasting: Researchers have been exploring various methods and techniques to improve tourism demand forecasting. Artificial intelligence-based methods, such as neural networks and support vector regression, have been found to be effective in predicting tourism demand. These algorithms have been used to optimize forecasting accuracy, improve model selection, and even combine regional predictions. As the field of tourism forecasting evolves, researchers are continuously finding new ways to apply machine learning algorithms and enhance their performance.
content.da: Turismeprognoser: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige metoder og teknikker for at forbedre prognoserne for turismeefterspørgsel. Kunstig intelligens-baserede metoder, såsom neurale netværk og support-vektor-regression, har vist sig at være effektive til at forudsige turismeefterspørgsel. Disse algoritmer er blevet brugt til at optimere prognosenøjagtigheden, forbedre modelvalg og endda kombinere regionale forudsigelser. Efterhånden som feltet for turismeprognoser udvikler sig, finder forskere kontinuerligt nye måder at anvende maskinlæringsalgoritmer på og forbedre deres ydeevne.
